#summary Currently supported features and future directions

==Current Support==

=Message types supported=

  * Sequence Reset
  * Heartbeat
  * SecurityList (partial)
  * MarketDataIncrementalRefresh
  * MarketDataSnapshotFullRefresh

=`MDEntryType`s supported=

  * Bid
  * Offer

==Currently Unimplemented==

=Messages=

  * additional information from SecurityList
  * News
  * SecurityStatus

=`MDEntryType`s=

  * Trade
  * Index Value
  * Opening/closing price
  * settlement price
  * trading session prices
  * imbalance
  * trade volume
  * open interest
  * security trading state
  * price band
